en.title: Article Continued
en.prompt: Continue writing an article about [theme] that begins with the following sentence:
en.remark: Complete the essay by continuing the opening section of the essay according to its theme.

metaTitle: Article Completer: Finish Your Story Flow
metaDescription: Stuck on an opening sentence? Provide a theme and start, and this AI will continue your article seamlessly. Overcome writer's block and finish your draft now!
